Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.file

Class FRCLogger

java.lang.Object
com.stuypulse.stuylib.file.FRCLogger
public class FRCLogger
extends java.lang.Object
A class that will let you log any class that implements loggable.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  FRCLogger.Loggable
    The Loggable interface should be implemented by a class that can return a useful piece of data that can be called on demand to be written into the log.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FRCLogger​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String name)
    Open a new FRCLogger

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clearLoggables()
    Clears the registered Loggables.
    FRCLogger.Loggable[] getLoggables()
    Gets the list of registered Loggables.
    void logAllRegisteredLoggables()
    Iterates through all the registered Loggables and logs them with level and data, if logThisIteration() is true.
    <T> void logError​(T obj, java.lang.Exception e)
    Log an error.
    void logManualLoggable​(FRCLogger.Loggable loggable)
    Forces Logger to log this Loggable.
    <T> void logMisc​(java.util.logging.Level level, T obj, java.lang.String toLog)
    Adds a new log entry to the log.
    void registerLoggable​(FRCLogger.Loggable loggable)
    Registers a new Loggable that upon call will put the next getLogData() at level getLogLevel() to the log if it will logThisIteration().
    void unregisterLoggable​(FRCLogger.Loggable loggable)
    Removes the Loggable implemented object from the registered Loggables.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • FRCLogger

      public FRCLogger​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String name)
      Open a new FRCLogger
      Parameters:
      path - Name of the director to store the log file to.
      name - Name of the file to write logs to.

  • Method Details

    • getLoggables

      public FRCLogger.Loggable[] getLoggables()
      Gets the list of registered Loggables.
      Returns:
      all registered Loggables as an array.

    • registerLoggable

      public void registerLoggable​(FRCLogger.Loggable loggable)
      Registers a new Loggable that upon call will put the next getLogData() at level getLogLevel() to the log if it will logThisIteration().
      Parameters:
      loggable - Class implementing Loggable

    • unregisterLoggable

      public void unregisterLoggable​(FRCLogger.Loggable loggable)
      Removes the Loggable implemented object from the registered Loggables.
      Parameters:
      loggable - Loggable to remove.

    • clearLoggables

      public void clearLoggables()
      Clears the registered Loggables.

    • logAllRegisteredLoggables

      public void logAllRegisteredLoggables()
      Iterates through all the registered Loggables and logs them with level and data, if logThisIteration() is true.

    • logManualLoggable

      public void logManualLoggable​(FRCLogger.Loggable loggable)
      Forces Logger to log this Loggable.
      Parameters:
      loggable - Loggable object to log.

    • logMisc

      public <T> void logMisc​(java.util.logging.Level level, T obj, java.lang.String toLog)
      Adds a new log entry to the log.
      Parameters:
      level - Level of severity of the log entry.
      obj - Object that is the source of the log entry.
      toLog - Log entry message.

    • logError

      public <T> void logError​(T obj, java.lang.Exception e)
      Log an error. Should be used in conjunction with try/catch.
      Parameters:
      obj - Object that is the source of the error.
      e - Exception, usually from try/catch
